Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Actually, Velociraptor's are 3 feet tall. Including tail they are 10 feet l=
ong, but I think they would easily fit into a cab. Ignore Jurassic Park, th=
ose bufoons made giant sized raptors, and they were really just 3 feet tall=
...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2001 9:53 AM
  Subject: Re: Dach=
ande respond or else


  Razor Claw gets scrunched into Optimus Primes cab =
section. Fealing somewhat claustrophobic he puts his foot through the winds=
hield trying to escape. 

  (I don't know if you've ever been inside the ca=
b of a truck but theres not much room for an average height human let alone=
 a raptor so the damage is logical.)

  "I am not fooled easily." Razor Cla=
w calls out furiously, "I have been educated on the legacy of Prime and you=
 cannot be him."
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: dachande 
    =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 12:58 PM
  =
  Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


    ::Optimus Prime::
     
     =
   He grabbed the tail and picked up the raptor. "You will listen to me. Do=
 you even know who I am? I am Optimus Prime, the leader of the Autobots, th=
e holder of the Matrix of Leadership."
        He transformed to truck mode=
, Razor Claw falling inside the cab section. "Follow me."
        He took o=
ff once again towards the CF.
     
    (He was holding him during transfor=
mation.)
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 6:07 PM
 =
     Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


      Razor Claw released his =
sword glaring at Optimus Prime and Eclipse. He transformed to Raptor to eve=
n the odds if necessary. "You ran from a battle while other Maximals risked=
 both spark and limb to protect it." The angry Raptor wan't in his right mi=
nd, he was suffering an imbalance brought on by Veratis' virus. His thought=
s were one sided and could only see his form of reason. 

      He was the =
mighty raptor and these four were no more than lowly prey to be consumed. i=
t didn't matter if he believed thier story. The desertion was merely an exc=
use to lash out and look tough. Lash out he did swinging his powerful tail =
at Optimus, slashin a claw from his left foot at Eclipse and snapping his j=
aws at Wolveritron.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: dac=
hande 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Monday, February 0=
5, 2001 8:19 AM
        Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


        ::O=
ptimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
         
            Optimus Prim=
e reached out and grabbed the sword, just holding it there.
            "Th=
ere will be no bloodshed today," Prime said. "Whatever these bots did, I'm =
sure they have their reasons. Please allow them to explain."
            Ec=
lipse looked at the bot and shifted to his most powerful form, the Werewolf=
. "We left the Cybertronian Fire because our work will not benifit if I am =
destroyed. The Alliance was coming dangeroudly close to destroying the CF. =
I had to get out. I am now returning to the CF, with Optimus Prime, here."
=
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: CYBERWOLF4 
       =
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 11=
:51 AM
          Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


          Razor Cl=
aw stood unmoving, staring Wolveritron down.

          "You don't fight ba=
ck?" he glared at the deserter HOPING FOR A RESPONSE.

          "You do no=
t fight then you admit your guilt." he drew his sword and swung it in a bac=
kslashing motion at a level to decapitate Wolveritron.


            ----- =
Original Message ----- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 9:31 PM
  =
          Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


            Razor Claw st=
ands up straight, looking toward Prime. "Stay out of this, you are not part=
 of the accused or a viable witness so you have no say in what happens to t=
hese deserters."

            The mutant wasn't exactly what bots would con=
sider sane. he was injected with a virus to stabilize his double transforma=
tion but was only given one sequence to key upon. Maybe it was the virus, m=
aybe it was his injuries, or maybe the former Pred was just sickened by bot=
s who'd run from a battle and leave thier comrades to suffer the pains of b=
attle.

            "Now for business I was dealing with you!" he reached o=
ut and poked Wolveritron in the chestplate trying to pursue his issues.


 =
             ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: dachande 
  =
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, Febru=
ary 01, 2001 1:57 PM
              Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


=
              ::Optimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
               
 =
                 They had not heard Razor Claw ask them to stop, but they h=
eard him the second time. Prime was walking away, but he stopped and came b=
ack.
                  "Is there something you need from us?" Prime asked.
=
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: CYBERWO=
LF4 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Thur=
sday, February 01, 2001 10:22 AM
                Subject: Re: Dachande resp=
ond or else


                It all started back when...


               =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: dachande 
       =
           To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Monday, December=
 18, 2000 7:40 PM
                  Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramu=
s


                  ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
                   
   =
                   They had heard the battling and decided to run away, the=
y needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as=
 they were leaving, and togther they exited the base, in beast modes. And h=
eaded far away

                  So I responded with...
                  =
. 
                  Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the=
 battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he mentally reporte=
d his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three until they w=
ere out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his s=
word and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to, your cho=
ice."

                  Then a few more posts of Razor Claw tracking them =
until finally Optimus Prime (Razor Claw doesn't know enough about Prime to =
recognise him) Wolveritron, Ramus, and Eclipse were finally together. and R=
azor Claw caught up with them.(I can't find the cave posting I thought it w=
as those three that were in the same cave as Vuloise.)

                  H=
e aproached the three bots ready for battle and hoping that things won't be=
 ended peacefully














        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
           
=
                    www.  .com
